sentences.en: Affecting nonchalance, I handed her two hundred dollar bills.
sentences.cn: 我装作一副无动于衷的样子，递给她200美元钞票。

sentences.en: Beneath his apparent nonchalance he is as nervous and excited as the rest of us.
sentences.cn: 他外表上冷静,实际上跟我们一样紧张不安.

sentences.en: He conceals his worries behind a mask of nonchalance.
sentences.cn: 他装作若无其事,借以掩饰内心的不安.

sentences.en: He looks at her, lights a cigarette with elaborate nonchalance.
sentences.cn: 他看着她, 点上了一支烟,极力装出一副满不在乎的样子.

sentences.en: His eyes, blue as the summer sky, gave away his fierce devotion to his friends, even when he tried to feign nonchalance.
sentences.cn: 他的眼眸蓝如夏日晴空，泄露了他对朋友们的深情厚意，尽管有时他试图装出一副冷淡的样子。

sentences.en: His nonchalant attitude nonchalance irritated me.
sentences.cn: 他那漠不关心的态度使我恼火.
乔恩装作若无其事的样子。

sentences.en: Mask He conceals his worries behind a mask of nonchalance.
sentences.cn: 他装做若无其事,借以掩饰内心的不安.

sentences.en: Scarlett turned away from Mammy with studied nonchalance , thankful that her face had been unnoticed in Mammy’s preoccupation with the matter of the shawl .
sentences.cn: 思嘉故意装出一副冷淡的样子掉过头去，幸喜嬷嬷正一个劲儿唠叨披肩的事，不曾看见她的脸。

sentences.en: She disguised her interest with nonchalance.
sentences.cn: 她用漠不关心来掩饰自己的兴趣.
她耸耸肩, 装出一副无所谓的样子.

sentences.en: She took her situation with much nonchalance.
sentences.cn: 她对这个处境毫不介意.

sentences.en: She was very tense, but she preserved an appearance of nonchalance.
sentences.cn: 她内心很紧张, 可外表却装着满不在乎的样子.

sentences.en: Some journalists criticize her nonchalance and indifference.
sentences.cn: 一些记者批评她的冷淡与漠不关心.

sentences.en: The contemptuous nonchalance of her trailed hand irritated him ( Elizabeth Bowen )
sentences.cn: 她的懒洋洋的手所显示出的蔑视而又漠不关心的态度激怒了他 ( 伊丽莎白鲍恩 )

sentences.en: The impasse was made worse by Jobert's passionate nature, which masqueraded as cynical nonchalance.
sentences.cn: 若贝尔以玩世不恭的态度掩饰感情奔放的天性, 这使局面越发僵化了.

sentences.en: Try not to convey arrogance, fear, resentment, conceit or too much nonchalance.
sentences.cn: 试着不要表现出自大 、 恐惧 、 不满 、 自负或者太多的冷漠.

sentences.en: Your irresolute attitude, coupled with your irrepressible sense of nonchalance simply is inappropriate to the seriousness of the situation.
sentences.cn: 你犹豫不决的态度以及抑制不住的冷淡与事态的严重性完全不相称。

words.tran_cn: 漠不关心,冷淡,若无其事

trans.tran_cn: 漠不关心，无动于衷，冷淡
